0541a6ba-07ad-4b95-8b16-9fe8463cdbbd.name: Constriction Attack
0541a6ba-07ad-4b95-8b16-9fe8463cdbbd.notes: If you succeed on a grapple against an opponent no larger than your own SM, on your next turn, and each successive turn, roll a Quick Contest of your ST vs. your victim’s ST or HT, whichever is higher. If you win, your victim takes damage equal to your margin of victory; otherwise, no damage is inflicted

354c07c3-f24d-4db3-804d-c9e46a5807ed.name: Oxygen Storage
354c07c3-f24d-4db3-804d-c9e46a5807ed.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

ef0bc7f0-dee0-4089-b75e-8e51d9edd1bb.name: Oxygen Storage
ef0bc7f0-dee0-4089-b75e-8e51d9edd1bb.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

a77d3913-1fb1-4584-90ed-ce8064a8e293.name: Oxygen Storage
a77d3913-1fb1-4584-90ed-ce8064a8e293.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

520a6753-e350-4a15-80ba-86268c1d6229.name: Oxygen Storage
520a6753-e350-4a15-80ba-86268c1d6229.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

1a26ddb7-c476-4b8e-8b5d-ef488360abbb.name: Oxygen Storage
1a26ddb7-c476-4b8e-8b5d-ef488360abbb.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

b3ec77e0-e04a-4973-865e-a89496eb6b0f.name: Diffuse
b3ec77e0-e04a-4973-865e-a89496eb6b0f.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

38aa1f78-8701-4693-838b-7ad3c410a8ac.name: Homogenous
38aa1f78-8701-4693-838b-7ad3c410a8ac.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

71b1b591-762f-4c9c-91ce-e26d9d3e0ba7.name: No Blood
71b1b591-762f-4c9c-91ce-e26d9d3e0ba7.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

49005f5e-f818-4380-acda-ef75aefe8237.name: No Brain
49005f5e-f818-4380-acda-ef75aefe8237.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

dd86b2fc-232b-4cbd-b0dc-0829628a03dd.name: No Eyes
dd86b2fc-232b-4cbd-b0dc-0829628a03dd.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

2d978956-66fc-404c-89a3-41fd2970ce71.name: No Head
2d978956-66fc-404c-89a3-41fd2970ce71.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

a904fb57-95f4-44a6-aac9-7819d3169b47.name: No Neck
a904fb57-95f4-44a6-aac9-7819d3169b47.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

d5c4a45b-4401-4478-b320-5d9619e5a06c.name: No Vitals
d5c4a45b-4401-4478-b320-5d9619e5a06c.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

cedc9ad0-aeb0-4264-bbdb-0e9fa78e139e.name: Unliving
cedc9ad0-aeb0-4264-bbdb-0e9fa78e139e.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
